content: The conspiracy that the gang discovered was that JFK's death was not the result of a lone gunman, but a larger conspiracy involving the government. They discovered that officials from various government agencies and powerful businessmen had conspired to assassinate JFK as they believed his policies were a threat to their interests. They hired a professional assassin and made sure that the investigation of the crime was manipulated so the truth would never come out. The gang uncovered various documents, witness statements and other evidence that proved the involvement of government officials and the powerful businessmen in the assassination.
